id-69715.title: Planet Earth
id-69715.post-content:
The Planet Earth template is a multipurpose design that uses graphics to tell the story rather than images. It’s a well thought-out design that opens with a full screen illustration with engaging colors and a simple call to action.

The page opens into a business-style layout with alternating white and colored backgrounds, service boxes and calls to action within the page. There are also attractive supplementary pages and the opportunity to customize it and make it your own.

Key features of the Planet Earth template

  • Simple and effective multipurpose website template
  • Uses graphics and illustrations to great effect
  • Calm and engaging colors
  • Well-designed with excellent page balance
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-69715.post-excerpt: The Planet Earth multipurpose template is a captivating design with minimalist appeal

id-17534.title: Digital Agency
id-17534.post-content:
The Digital Agency template has a thoroughly modern feel with a strong homepage and bold colors. Combined with modern sans serif fonts and complementary design throughout the page, this template is perfect for both startups and more established organizations.

Pages are well laid out and contain everything a visitor would expect to see. All pages are fully customizable using your favorite page builder and can be fully customized to match your brand.

Key features of the Digital Agency template

  • Contemporary design ideal for new or more established businesses
  • Engaging colors and fonts
  • Customizable pages and layout
  • Built-in portfolio section and contact forms
  • Effective calls to action throughout
  • Full compatibility with drag and drop page builders
id-17534.post-excerpt: Fresh, modern template ideal for showcasing upstarts, startups and digital agencies

id-87989.title: Clothing Store
id-87989.post-content:
The Clothing Store template is an achingly stylish eCommerce template designed for modern retail. It opens with a full screen hero image with subtle navigation and cart feature at the top and opens into a smart store page with parallax effect.

The fully customizable template can be made to fit any brand or store type using built-in tools. You can change anything you like in seconds. The template is fully compatible with popular page builders so anyone, with any level of experience can craft something unique!

Key features of the Clothing Store template

  • Stylish modern store design
  • Engaging parallax effect on the homepage
  • Attractive product and checkout pages
  • SEO friendly and fully responsive
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-87989.post-excerpt: The Clothing Store template is a stylish take on eCommerce that’s a joy to use

id-57022.title: Tech News
id-57022.post-content:
Build a technology website using the Tech News template and share the latest trends related to technology, gadgets, software, apps, games, and more. The clean and clutter-free design will help your website visitors find what they're looking for without digging through piles of information. 

The template features a newsletter subscription form that will let you build your newsletter list quickly and easily.

Key features of the Tech News template

  • Simple and clutter-free website template, perfect for a technology website
  • The package includes well-planned layouts for individual category pages as well
  • Build an email list using the well-integrated newsletter subscription form
  • The template consists of placeholders for showcasing ads and monetizing your blog
  • Compatible with Gutenberg and all popular page builder plugins
id-57022.post-excerpt: Clean and simple website template, perfect for your technology news website

id-117116.title: Professional Consultant
id-117116.post-content:
Our Professional Consultant web template provides everything you need to launch a polished, client-ready website in minutes. Designed for consultants, freelancers and small businesses, this full site template combines a clean design with powerful features so you can showcase your expertise and attract new clients.

Whether you’re building your personal brand or creating a consulting agency, the template is flexible, mobile-friendly and optimized for conversions. With drag and drop editing, you’ll save time and money while presenting a professional online image that helps build trust.

Key features of the Professional Consultant template:

  • Sleek, flexible design ideal for professional industries
  • Comes complete with all essential pages for consultants
  • Working contact form for instant engagement
  • Easy customization with the block editor or Elementor
  • Fast-loading, mobile-optimized design
id-117116.post-excerpt: Build a polished website fast with our Professional Consultant template. A full site design perfect for freelancers, small businesses and agencies.

id-59264.title: Personal Portfolio
id-59264.post-content:
The Personal Portfolio template has been designed to showcase you and your services without going over the top. The homepage image sets the scene and the use of serif fonts and calm colors inspire confidence.

The template includes lots of options to tell your story, add examples of work, testimonials, images, video and other content. There’s also a readymade portfolio page to help you promote your work.

Key features of the Personal Portfolio template

  • Simple and attractive portfolio web template
  • Header image and headline make an instant connection
  • Pastel colors and serif fonts help inspire confidence
  • Lots of options to promote yourself and your work
  • Readymade portfolio and contact pages
  • Fully compatible with popular drag and drop page builders
id-59264.post-excerpt: Attractive portfolio template that’s ideal for showcasing personal or professional work

id-59455.title: Construction Company
id-59455.post-content:
The Construction Company template is a bright and engaging design with bold colors, plenty of images and lots of whitespace to add balance. The homepage includes lots of content and service areas, somewhere to show off building projects and lots more besides.

The Construction Company template comes with readymade pages for projects, services, about the company and a contact and quote page. Elements also include FAQs, testimonials, social media, a contact form and very attractive headers and footers. Everything a business needs for their online presence!

Key features of the Construction Company template

  • Bright and engaging design ideal for construction companies
  • Well-balanced design with equal areas of boldness and whitespace
  • Includes typical page elements a construction company would need
  • Template can be fully customized without touching code
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-59455.post-excerpt: Construction Company has everything a building firm needs to launch a website

id-46177.title: Mountain
id-46177.post-content:
Whether you’re an individual or a business, this fast, fully responsive multipurpose template, gives you all the tools you need to build a website. It provides the foundation for an amazing website. All it needs is your creativity.

Offer your services on the homepage and in the provided service page template. The template comes with a significant hero image that includes CTA buttons. Additionally, share those breathtaking mountain photos to entice your audience.

Key features of the Mountain template

  • Simple and clean design, ideal for building a multipurpose website
  • Dedicated section to offer your services on the homepage
  • Share breathtaking photos
  • Call to action button integrated into the top menu
  • Compatible with all popular page builders
id-46177.post-excerpt: A fantastic multipurpose website template with modern typography and engaging design

id-69418.title: Be Bold
id-69418.post-content:
The Be Bold template reflects the quality of many successful stores, well-chosen colors and fonts, confidence-inspiring feel and a genuine elegance that inspires you to purchase.

This is a full width template that uses every inch of screen to help create that image of a lifestyle. Amazing images, attractive product showcases and parallax effects help create the same feeling you get from well-known brand stores. All designed to help you convert.

Key features of the Be Bold template

  • Professional-quality eCommerce template
  • Superb use of colors and fonts
  • Designed to sell using images
  • Awesome layout and design
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-69418.post-excerpt: Upscale eCommerce template that inspires confidence and encourages you to buy

id-92985.title: Non-Profit Organization
id-92985.post-content:
The Non-Profit Organization template combines business and corporate elements with the warm welcome and inclusivity of a good cause. It’s an excellent blend of professional and friendly and could work wonders for your nonprofit organization whether you’re trying to raise money or awareness.

The template looks great as it is but you can customize it however you like. Change colors, fonts, layout, calls to action and everything you see using built-in tools. It’s easy to do and requires no WordPress knowledge.

Key features of the Non-Profit Organization template

  • Well-blended template for charities and nonprofits
  • Combination of warm welcome and business elements
  • Can help you tell your story and accept donations
  • SEO friendly and fully responsive
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-92985.post-excerpt: The Non-Profit Organization template is ideal for charities, community initiatives, and social impact groups.

id-72618.title: Fashion Photography Portfolio
id-72618.post-content:
The Fashion Photography Portfolio template is an elegant dark design that sets the scene immediately. It’s a grownup theme that delivers style through contrasting black and white design while offering pops of color through the images.

The template includes lots of space to showcase images and share your story to help engage. The portfolio area and dedicated page use customizable grid layouts to share and filter images and showcase your work so it looks its best.

Key features of the Fashion Photography Portfolio template

  • Dark elegant template with a grownup appeal
  • Plenty of opportunities to showcase images
  • Attractive portfolio section and page
  • Flexible content areas to communicate with your audience
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-72618.post-excerpt: The Fashion Photography Portfolio is the perfect way to showcase your creations

id-83885.title: Hope
id-83885.post-content:
Unleash the power of exceptional design with the Hope template for web designers! Crafted for creative professionals, this template ensures your website is not just a platform but a masterpiece.

The sleek and intuitive design allows you to showcase your portfolio effortlessly, creating a lasting impression on visitors. Elevate your brand with a professional-quality website that speaks volumes about your design expertise.

Key features of the Hope Template:

  • Sleek design to show your skills
  • Easy customization thanks to built-in Site Builder
  • Designed for speed and usability
  • Professional-quality template designed for the niche
  • Full compatibility with popular page builders
id-83885.post-excerpt: Transform your online presence with our sleek web designer template!

id-110168.title: Construction Company
id-110168.post-content:
The Construction Company template delivers a bold, confident design that’s perfect for showcasing services, past projects, and customer trust. It’s clean, fast-loading, and designed to highlight what you do best. 

The layout strikes a perfect balance between form and function, giving your business a solid digital foundation. With simple navigation, strong calls to action, and plenty of space for visuals and testimonials, this template makes it easy to win trust and attract new clients.

Key features of the Construction Company template:

  • Modern layout made specifically for the construction industry
  • All pages import exactly as the demo including copy and images
  • Projects section to showcase past work
  • Easy customization with the block editor or Elementor
  • Fast-loading, mobile-optimized design
id-110168.post-excerpt: The Construction Company template blends performance, style, and function, ideal for architects, construction firms or anyone in the building trade.

id-103950.title: SaaS Landing Page
id-103950.post-content:
The SaaS Landing Page Signature Template is the ultimate starting point for building a sleek, high-converting homepage for your business. Designed for speed, clarity, and conversion, this WordPress template makes it easy to showcase value, highlight features, and turn curious visitors into paying customers.

Built with marketers and founders in mind, it includes pre-designed sections for hero messaging, testimonials, feature highlights, pricing tables, and CTAs. With stunning visuals, effortless navigation, and persuasive copy areas, it's everything you need to launch with confidence and style.

Key features of the SaaS Landing Page template

  • Premium design built for conversion
  • Full website with working lead generation form
  • Fully customizable using built-in tools
  • SEO friendly and fully responsive
  • Full compatibility with popular page builders
id-103950.post-excerpt: Convert visitors with a high-converting, modern SaaS landing page template. Premium design meets full site convenience with a brand new Signature Template.

id-73460.title: Politician
id-73460.post-content:
The Politician template is ideal for politicians, councilors, and other public figures who want to get out there, make themselves and their causes known and interact with their constituents.

The design is sober and sensible to create a feeling of trust. There’s a large hero image, ideal for making your presence known along with plenty of content blocks to tell your story and communicate with your audience. It’s a fantastic template for engagement!

Key features of the Politician template

  • Sensible design inspires confidence
  • Ideal for getting yourself out there
  • Lots of options for storytelling and sharing your vision
  • Fully responsive and customizable
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-73460.post-excerpt: The Politician template is ideal for public figures to reach out to constituents
